channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Escape to the Country
channel.desc: Cambridgeshire, England keeps Nicki and a couple from London busy visiting an office, a co-housing development and a local florist, in between searching for a new house in which to entertain; the young buyers are hopeful they can buy a property.
